QuestData.Title: Forced Grounding
QuestData.Description:
<This is one of the spears that Faithless trappers use to pull pterrordaxes to the ground. It has a long chain attached to its base.
With good aim, you could use it to pull a Faithless pterrordax rider to the ground so you could fight them.>
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Sethrak commander riding a large pterrordax in the sky.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Faithless Trapper's Spear to pull Fangcaller Hrillik's pterrordax down from the sky above you, and kill him.
